update user_wq set Uname_wq = #{Uname_wq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Utel_wq = #{Utel_wq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Usex_wq = #{Usex_wq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Uimg_wq = #{Uimg_wq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Uattr_wq = #{Uattr_wq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Ushenfenzheng_wq = #{Ushenfenzheng_wq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Ujianjie_wq = #{Ujianjie_wq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Upwd_wq = #{Upwd_wq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Uage_wq = #{Uage_wq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UTime_wq = #{UTime_wq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where Uid_wq = #{Uid_wq,jdbcType=INTEGER }
